SEARCH
Package com.dua3.meja.model

Class AbstractWorkbook<S extends AbstractSheet<S,R,C>,R extends AbstractRow<S,R,C>,C extends AbstractCell<S,R,C>>

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.meja.model.AbstractWorkbook<S,R,C>
Type Parameters:
S - the type of sheet contained in the workbook
R - the type of row contained in the sheets of the workbook
C - the type of cell contained in the rows of the sheets in the workbook
All Implemented Interfaces:
Workbook, AutoCloseable, Iterable<Sheet>
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenericWorkbook, PoiWorkbook
public abstract class AbstractWorkbook<S extends AbstractSheet<S,R,C>,R extends AbstractRow<S,R,C>,C extends AbstractCell<S,R,C>> extends Object implements Workbook
Abstract base class for implementations of the Workbook interface.

    • unsubscribe

      public void unsubscribe(Flow.Subscriber<WorkbookEvent> subscriber)
      Description copied from interface: Workbook
      Unsubscribe from workbook events.

      If the given subscriber is currently subscribed to this workbook's event stream, it will be deregistered and will no longer receive events. If the subscriber is not registered, this method does nothing.

      Specified by:
      unsubscribe in interface Workbook
      Parameters:
      subscriber - the previously registered subscriber to remove
